recommended_degree: Manajemen, Bisnis, Ekonomi, Manajemen Pemasaran, Ilmu Komunikasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: As a Marketing Intern, you will support key marketing operations, including creating special packages, preparing administrative memos, and drafting MoUs. You will also assist in gathering market insights, organizing campaign materials, and ensuring documentation is accurate and timely. This role requires attention to detail, efficient workflow in a fast-paced environment, and a proactive approach to daily tasks.
